statements: SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources;
SELECT source_name, location FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE location='California';
SELECT id, source_name, capacity FROM renewable_energy_sources ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT source_name, utilization_percentage FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE utilization_percentage > 50;
SELECT MAX(capacity) AS max_capacity FROM renewable_energy_sources;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE location = 'California' ORDER BY utilization_percentage DESC
SELECT source_name, location FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY source_name ASC
SELECT id, location, utilization_percentage FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE capacity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE source_name LIKE 'Solar%' OR source_name LIKE 'Wind%'
SELECT location, AVG(capacity) AS average_capacity FROM renewable_energy_sources GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(capacity) > 150
SELECT * FROM EnergySources;
SELECT source_name, capacity FROM EnergySources;
SELECT source_name, location FROM EnergySources ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergySources WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT source_name, location, capacity FROM EnergySources WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT source_name, location, capacity FROM EnergySources WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT source_name, capacity, location FROM EnergySources WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT source_name, capacity, location FROM EnergySources WHERE source_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT source_name, location, capacity FROM EnergySources ORDER BY location ASC, capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergySources es JOIN SupplyChainUtilization scu ON es.source_id = scu.source_id WHERE scu.quantity > 500 ORDER BY es.capacity ASC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources;
SELECT capacity, source_name FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE capacity > 500;
SELECT location, source_name, capacity FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE location LIKE 'USA%';
SELECT partner_name, contact_email, partner_type FROM supply_chain_partners;
SELECT utilization_percentage FROM energy_utilization WHERE partner_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources
SELECT source_name, capacity FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE capacity > 500
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_partners ORDER BY partner_name DESC
SELECT partner_name, partner_type FROM supply_chain_partners WHERE partner_type = 'Supplier'
SELECT r.source_name, e.utilization_percentage FROM renewable_energy_sources r JOIN energy_utilization e ON r.id = e.source_id WHERE e.utilization_percentage > 75
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, product_price FROM Suppliers JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE product_category='Electronics';

SELECT supplier_name, source_name, source_type FROM Suppliers JOIN SupplyChain ON Suppliers.supplier_id = SupplyChain.supplier_id JOIN EnergySources ON SupplyChain.source_id = EnergySources.source_id;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_location='New York';
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_category='Electronics' ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT s.supplier_name, p.product_name, e.source_name FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.product_id JOIN EnergySources e ON p.product_id = e.source_id;

SELECT s.supplier_name, p.product_name, e.source_name FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.product_id JOIN EnergySources e ON p.product_id = e.source_id WHERE supplier_name='ABC Company';
SELECT * FROM EnergySources;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM EnergySources WHERE source_capacity > 1000;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, supplier_rating FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_rating >= 4 ORDER BY supplier_location ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, supplier_name FROM Products INNER JOIN Suppliers ON Products.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_quantity, delivery_status FROM Orders INNER JOIN Shipments ON Orders.order_id = Shipments.order_id WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM EnergySources WHERE source_type='Renewable' ORDER BY source_capacity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, source_name FROM Suppliers JOIN EnergySources ON Suppliers.source_id = EnergySources.source_id WHERE supplier_rating > 4 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;

SELECT product_name, product_category, supplier_name FROM Products JOIN Suppliers ON Products.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id WHERE supplier_location='USA' AND product_category='Electronics' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_quantity FROM Orders WHERE order_quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, delivery_status FROM Shipments WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY shipment_date ASC;
